text: <@U04DVL5T2TE> any thoughts here? Could/should we expose some way in our project to add to `previewHead`? Maybe via a similar `preview-head.html` pattern as `.storybook/preview-head.html` ?

any chance there's something obvious I missed to make sure 2 of the same project modules on a page are treated as unique? I have 2 video modules I created and they seem to block each other (only the first one plays and is interactive)
Do you a link to a preview page?
I guess you could also setup storybook manually in your project and not run it through the `hs-cms-dev-server` too?  I appreciate any insights you might have.
does the new "beta editor" on HubSpot pages have anything to do with react modules?
